name: Old School Runescape
notes:
REQUIRES: java and p7zip.
This installer downloads and extracts the official multi-platform java client packaged in the the mac version of OSRS, and sets up a simple .sh file to run it on linux.

For additional information on installing java and p7zip on your distribution, or any technical errors/questions related to this installer see: 
https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/w/Linux_game_installation_guide#Java
content:
files:
- setup:
    filename: OldSchool.dmg
    url: https://www.runescape.com/downloads/OldSchool.dmg
game:
  exe: osrslauncher.sh
installer:
- execute:
    command: 7z e -o'$CACHE/setup/OldSchool-dmg' -y '$CACHE/setup/OldSchool.dmg'
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/setup/OldSchool-dmg/jagexappletviewer.jar
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      java -Dsun.java2d.opengl=''True'' -Dsun.java2d.uiScale=''2'' -Duser.home=''.''
      -Djava.class.path=''$GAMEDIR/jagexappletviewer.jar'' -Dcom.jagex.config=''http://oldschool.runescape.com/jav_config.ws''
      ''jagexappletviewer'' ''oldschool'''
    file: $GAMEDIR/osrslauncher.sh
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/osrslauncher.sh
